heading: New Spain.
general-note: Here are entered works on the Viceroyalty of New Spain (1535-1821), the Spanish colonial territory comprising at its greatest extent, Mexico, the Caribbean Islands, Central America north of Panama, the coast of Venezuela, Florida, the present southwestern U.S., and the Philippines. Works limited to the history of the present country of Mexico during the period 1540-1810 are entered under the heading. Mexico--History--Spanish colony, 1540-1810..
